titleStmt.title: New observations dedicated to the Kings most excellent Majestie, from all his loving subjects concerning peace. And humbly presented to the Honorable House of Commons for their incouragement to the perfection of that good worke of peace and union in the church and state. By J.B. Ca.Pe.
titleStmt.author: J. B., Ca. Pe.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
